sections.title: Sacred Sentinel (Class Overview)
sections.description: Overview of the Sacred Sentinel class including role, alignment, hit die, and starting wealth.

sections.title: Code of the Creator (Su) (Sacred Sentinel)
sections.description: Sacred sentinels must follow the paladin's code of the Creator, with violations causing loss of all class features except skills for 24 hours. Cavaliers treat this code as their order's edict.

sections.title: Strategic Protection (Su) (Sacred Sentinel)
sections.description: As a move action, establishes a protective aura affecting allies within range, granting scaling bonuses to CMD and Constitution checks to stabilize. The aura lasts until the beginning of the sacred sentinel's next turn.

sections.title: Renewed Bonds (Ex) (Sacred Sentinel)
sections.description: Maintains bonds from previous classes by stacking sacred sentinel levels with animal companion, familiar, or bond class features, and enhances specific class features from cavalier, paladin, or warpriest classes.

sections.title: Healing Touch (Su) (Sacred Sentinel)
sections.description: Heals wounds by touch for 3d8 hit points (scaling to 5d8), usable on strategic protection allies within aura range without requiring touch attacks. Qualifies as lay on hands for prerequisites and abilities.

sections.title: Tempering Touch (Su) (Sacred Sentinel)
sections.description: When healing an ally with spells or class features, grants them scaling deflection and sacred bonuses when fighting defensively, using full defense, or Combat Expertise for a number of rounds equal to class level.

sections.title: Uncanny Dodge (Ex) (Sacred Sentinel)
sections.description: Gains uncanny dodge as per the rogue class feature, or improved uncanny dodge if already possessing uncanny dodge from another class.

sections.title: Swift Shield Other (Sp) (Sacred Sentinel)
sections.description: Can use shield other as a quickened spell-like ability a number of times per day equal to Charisma bonus (minimum once per day).

sections.title: Unyielding (Su) (Sacred Sentinel)
sections.description: When killed while strategic protection is active, remains alive and functional until the beginning of next turn, during which only breath of life can save them.
